language.description: card commands exchanger for PC/SC and serial readers
language.readersel: Enter reader number to use (write EXIT to exit)
language.cmdtosend: Enter command to send (write EXIT to exit)
language.infodesc: Cross platform C# application to send/receive data with a standard PC/SC smartcard reader. - Multilanguage (using xml language files in Language folder) - Gui (using Gtk# binding for Gtk graphic libraries) - Console interface also supported - Debug/Trace (can be sended to console and also to a log file to read after) author: Armando Basile (hmandevteam@gmail.com) website: comex-project.googlecode.com issue tracker: code.google.com/p/comex-project/issues/list
language.thanksdesc: Si ringraziano gli sviluppatori, tester, traduttori, web designer e tutti coloro che hanno collaborato in qualsiasi forma al progetto.
